sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Layout from '../components/Layout'; import './Referrals.css'; const Referrals = () => { const [referralEarning, setReferralEarning] = useState(0); const [totalReferrals, setTotalReferrals] = useState(0); const referralLink = 'https://licrown.ai/auth/sign-up?ref=SHIFASALMAN'; const referralCode = 'SHIFASALMAN3986'; const commissionLevels = [ { level: 1, name: 'Direct Referral', rate: '6%', members: 0, commission: 0.00, icon: 'fas fa-user-plus', bgClass: 'bg-green', badgeClass: 'bg-primary-custom', badgeText: 'Level 1' }, { level: 2, name: 'Second Level', rate: '3%', members: 0, commission: 0.00, icon: 'fas fa-users', bgClass: 'bg-blue', badgeClass: 'bg-info-custom', badgeText: 'Level 2' }, { level: 3, name: 'Third Level', rate: '3%', members: 0, commission: 0.00, icon: 'fas fa-network-wired', bgClass: 'bg-purple', badgeClass: 'bg-purple-light', badgeText: 'Level 3' }, { level: 4, name: 'Fourth Level', rate: '3%', members: 0, commission: 0.00, icon: 'fas fa-layer-group', bgClass: 'bg-orange', badgeClass: 'bg-warning-custom', badgeText: 'Level 4' }, { level: 5, name: 'Fifth Level', rate: '3%', members: 0, commission: 0.00, icon: 'fas fa-crown', bgClass: 'bg-red', badgeClass: 'bg-danger-custom', badgeText: 'Level 5' } ]; const copyToClipboard = (text) => { navigator.clipboard.writeText(text).then(() => { alert('Copied to clipboard: ' + text); }).catch(err => { console.error('Could not copy text: ', err); }); }; const handleClaimEarnings = () => { if (referralEarning < 1) { alert('Minimum $1 required to claim earnings'); return; } alert('Earnings claimed successfully!'); setReferralEarning(0); }; const progressPercentage = Math.min((referralEarning / 1) * 100, 100); return (
{/* Top Row */}
{/* Referral Earning Wallet */}
Referral Earning Wallet

Your current available balance

$ {referralEarning.toFixed(0)}

Minimum $1

${(1 - referralEarning).toFixed(2)} more needed to claim

You can claim referral earnings when balance reaches $1 or more

{/* Right Column */}
{/* Total Referral Earning */}

Total Referral Earning

$0.00

{/* Total Referrals */}

Total Referrals

{totalReferrals}

{/* Referral Link */}
Referral Link
{referralLink}
{/* Referral Code */}
Referral Code
{referralCode}
{/* Investment Commission Structure */}
Investment Commission Structure
{commissionLevels.map((level, index) => (

{level.name}

Commission Rate

{level.rate}

Total Members: {level.members}
{level.badgeText}
Total Commission: ${level.commission.toFixed(2)}
Earned
))}
); }; export default Referrals;
